website_summaries.verdict: Has a vintage look that works well with traditional designs as well as decor that needs more functionality.
pros: Velour upholstery offers an elegant look
Victorian style construction with sturdy legs
Tufted surface promotes a classic look while hiding the sleeping foam underneath
Color options are subtle to fit common vintage schemes
cons: Too firm for some to sleep comfortably at night

customer_reviews.title: It just ain’t right
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks I guess. Assembly wasn’t too rough. Packaged cleverly. But here’s the thing : a couch is to be sat on, it’s hard to sit on this. There’s not a comfortable position. It’s just plain old awkward. I had high hopes, perhaps foolish of me for the price tag being considered. Or maybe I’m just fancy, I don’t know. I don’t think that’s the case though, all I want is something that looks nice and is comfortable as the same time; If only I had a lot of money. In the end, the couch just ain’t right. You buy this thing and you’re gonna be sayin the same, for real.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Wonderful Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a small fold out couch for almost a year now for my small one bedroom apartment. Originally wanted storage/guest sleeping and found it for $600 at IKEA, a slightly too large sectional. I don't have AC in my bedroom so during summer I usually sleep on the couch, being in a hotter part of Los Angeles. This futon completely looks like a couch, very comfortable seated position and sturdier than I thought. Looking forward to sleeping on it. Was very comfy laying down on the regular couch without folding down. Great color, tough fabric. Very firm, but I do like that. So thrilled for the price, quality and speed in which it was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S

customer_reviews.title: Comfy couch
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfy couch. As is on photo. Very easy to assemble. The fabric is soft. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine O.

customer_reviews.title: So happy we pulled the trigger on this
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this couch especially for the money! We put it in our Airstream trailer, and it has taken the design to another level. So happy we pulled the trigger on this. I also like the mustard color; unique and funky. It is firm but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William Skiles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little couch!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little couch. More comfortable than expected based on other reviews. Easy to assemble and fast shipping. VERY worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jason J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Bought for a spare room/office space
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Bought for a spare room/office space. Fits perfectly. It's not terribly comfortable to sleep on when folded down, but I laid a mattress pad on top and that did the trick perfectly. Fabric is durable and the design is gorgeous, the legs are so modern! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this couch for a short while with limited use and it is already extremely uncomfortable. When you sit you feel every spring in the seat. I would strongly recommend purchasing a different couch. I wish I would have been more attentive to the other reviews that discuss the comfort level.
customer_reviews.author: CouchSeeker

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE quality
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this sofa for a couple months now and wow it is the cheapest, most uncomfortable sofa I’ve ever sat on. There was little to no padding to begin with but now that’s we’ve had it a couple months there is zero cushion. When you sit or lay down all you feel is the wooden frame. It is so cheap it is actually embarrassing to have company over and people sit on it. We’ll be tossing it as soon as we can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Great couch!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this couch to replace one that had started falling apart. The shipping was quicker than expected, and arrived in great shape. There were no reviews on Amazon when we ordered, but a quick search, found a few sites that had four and a half stars. The couch was easy to put together, and looks very nice. The cusions are fairly stiff, and provide great support. I have a bad back, and have to be careful where I sit, and this couch is perfect for it. My family and I love it! It seats all four of us nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: and the legs become loose pretty much every 2 weeks and require tightening
customer_reviews.text: Really poorly costructed, quite a pain to put together without power tools, and the legs become loose pretty much every 2 weeks and require tightening. The cushion is very uneven(sinks in some places and you can feel the foundation in other places), very uncomfortable to sleep on as well). Not sure why anyone would like this product. Update: 2 months in, the cushion has completely gone, COMPLETELY...it feels like we are sitting on wood with things poking and hurting everytime. This is the worst product I have ever bought from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: sidharths

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty but it’s a piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: It looks pretty but it’s a piece of crap. I’ve owned it since October and the legs just broke off of it. The boards hurt to sit on and the quality just isn’t there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Terrible! Terrible! I feel every single metal spring in the seat of the couch and it just got worse!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t assemble; UPDATE; legs are so loose to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this futon! But when I was assembling it, it doesn’t work. One of the leg holes are too big and I can’t get the leg on. I changed the legs around several times. Tried everything. Doesn’t work. I called them and was told they would email me to send them a video. It’s been a month. To return it I need the box, which I tossed out. It’s too heavy and wouldn’t even fit in my car. So I’m stuck with this thing on my floor. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karelia Avila

customer_reviews.title: and was really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: For $200 this is a 5 star product. It got delivered in a decent amount of time, and was really easy to put together. It's a little more firm than what I usually like, but it's not uncomfortable. I even took a nap on it the other day. It was even a little bigger than I thought it would be. My family of 3 has plenty of room when we all sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy M.

customer_reviews.title: There a bunch of reviews saying this is comfortable. It is definitely not
customer_reviews.text: There a bunch of reviews saying this is comfortable. It is definitely not. Very very hard, I cant imagine sleeping on it. Maybe after a few months of sitting on it, it will soften up. Setting it up was easy, took 10 minutes by myself, the hardest part was getting the box open. It looks nice, exactly like the picture, good color. It's good to look at, not so much to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart After 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: This couch was an absolute piece of crap. Within a month, springs were popping out. But they are easy enough to put back in. Until it starts happening daily. And then multiple times a day. Then 3 months into the purchase the legs started breaking. Wood peeling off the frame. Had to throw it on the curb almost 3 months from the day of purchase. Its a shame. The couch was really comfortable when it wasnt falling completely apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas McKee

customer_reviews.title: 100% in love with this couch
customer_reviews.text: More than happy with this couch. It is so perfect and looks better than I expected. The material is a nice quality. I obviously didn’t expect this to be a cushiony soft couch but it’s the perfect level of firm. Comfortable to sit on and decent for naps. I can’t stress enough how glad I am that I purchased it. I’ve had it for many months now. Easy to put together and I was able to get it from the garage to my bedroom on the 4th floor of a townhouse by myself before opening the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: This futon LOOKS great. But that's the only good thing about it. It's horrible to sleep on. It's comfortable to sit on for a short time, but there are too many un-cushioned spots where you can feel the hard wood. The back does not partially recline- that function is broken. It is up or down. At least when down, there are legs that fold out to support it... should anyone HAVE to sleep on it. As cute as this futon is, I regret not buying the more comfortable classic style futon for half the price at the big box store.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sofa with beautiful design. Same as pictured and fabric is beautiful too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: F. Avais

customer_reviews.title: Tempting for the price but doesn’t hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but doesn’t hold up. The armrest is already starting to break and I’ve only had it a few months. I’m very disappointed. The fabric quality is also poor and discoloration occurs if you get it wet.
customer_reviews.author: krit

customer_reviews.title: Cushioingn doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this futon for 5 months. I sit on it at least once everyday, and I tend to sit in the same spot. I've noticed that the cushioning in the area I sit on is wearing down to the point that I can feel the springs. I think this is ridiculous after only 5 months. I do sit in the same spot everyday, but I'm only 150 pounds and I don't sit on it all day long. I live alone so no one sits on it but me. I shouldn't be feeling springs after only 5 months. I love the color and design, but if its something you're going to be using on a regular basis.......keep shopping!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Already falling apart
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. One arm was defective upon arrival, but the company promptly sent me a replacement. The couch held together for a little less than one year. Everyone who has sat on this couch has weighed 170 lbs or less. The middle of the couch is permanently indented. One of the legs has fallen off. Every time I move the couch to vacuum underneath, the leg falls off, and I have to reattach it after the couch is in place. It gets annoying really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for a $260 sofa
customer_reviews.text: Just got my couch today. It was pretty easy to assemble, just by myself it took me about a half hour. I got the mustard color because it was cheaper than the other colors ($260 when I ordered it) and it also matches a new rug I got. It is pretty firm but its not uncomfortable. I got this for whenever I have family come to visit and I think I'm going to buy a cheap mattress pad to put on the top if anyone who sleeps on it prefers it softer. But it works great and it fits perfectly for where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Super uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to assemble that’s the only positive, it looks nothing like the picture, for the price it isn’t worth a dime. It’s so uncomfortable and hard it feels like you’re sitting on bricks . I wonder if the memory foam version is any good . But after this purchase I’m scared to even bother with this brand anymore. 5 stars for Easy to assemble . And I would give zero for the comfort and the reality vs expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Braunte

customer_reviews.title: Shows even water marks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these couches because I loved their style and colors. They’re so stylish and I love how it looks at our home BUT when it gets dirty, there is no way to clean it completely because it shows water marks after it dries. I’m so tired trying to clean and wipe it as I have a kid at home. Other than that it’s a good couch. It’s not very comfortable but it’s okay for us. We haven’t used it as a futon yet so I don’t know how it feels when used it as a futon.
customer_reviews.author: Busra Ozdemir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Super easy setup. The couch is a little low to the ground, but that works perfectly for the space I needed it to fill. The color is accurate and beautiful. It's not the most comfortable couch, but it's not uncomfortable. I use it for clients for an hour a couple times a week and it works great. I'm happy with my purchase. The price seems about accurate for the quality. I would buy again if I need another couch like this.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Nope nope nope.
customer_reviews.text: It’s so uncomfortable. Unless you are putting it somewhere for MINIMAL use and more for decor- don’t buy it. If you lean against the arms you can feel the wood so much that you need a pillow. If you use it as a futon the back is not level with the seat and even with a foam topper it’s uncomfortable. It was packaged nicely. Assembly required and it’s not hard. I don’t leave bad reviews but I had to share because this is just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Around

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my most regretted online purchase ever. It arrived in February and it already has several spots where the cushion has worn down and it feels like you’re sitting on a piece of wood. It has the thinnest veil of cushion on the frame it’s ridiculous. The couch itself is very aesthetically pleasing but it is just not comfortable at all. I’m already in the process of replacing it and I’ve only had it in my home for a few months lol. Do yourself a favor and don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Camila garcia

customer_reviews.title: Color is Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I do like this futon. I was disappointed in the color. I ordered dark grey, and this futon is definitely more of a navy color. I checked my order and the box it came in and both said dark grey. So the picture is not an accurate representation of how it actually looks. It still fits in my living room nicely though. It also came with a snag in the fabric that I had to cut and tie. It was very easy to assemble though and is reasonably comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: HMH15

customer_reviews.title: The arms fall off and the back rest hinge has metal fatigue. Purchased in May is garbage now
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this couch in may. In about 1 month the arms started spreading out so that they almost looked like they were falling off. They could not be bolstered or repaired due to the way the couch is made. The back rest is floating closer and closer to the floor. People are going to hurt themselves on this couch as it looks as if its about to collapse. BUY A COUCH WITH A WARANTEE. It may cost you a few bucks more but its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Micha v A

customer_reviews.title: SO Cute, But SO Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this is a really, really good-looking couch. The blue color is bright and pretty, and it has a nice mid-century modern feel to it. Set-up wasn't difficult at all. HOWEVER, it is the most uncomfortable couch ever. My back is totally screwed up from sitting/laying on this thing in the evenings....it's ridiculous! I'm sure we can't return it at this point, so we're going to have to figure something out to make it bearable. DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE RUBBISH
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sofa less than a year a go for my small condo and I lost count of how many times I've had to fix the legs as they get lose and kept having to put things under it just to make sure it stayed up and btw I'm a small girl so weight on this piece of furniture should not be the reason to fall apart also no one else uses it just me, my neighbour finally had to help me get rid of it as I just couldn't keep trying to repair it any longer so don't buy it is a waste of money and it last only a minute
customer_reviews.author: Luvlife

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Garbage I wish I would have listened to the bad reviews. I got this couch the beginning of March and it broke April 5th. I literally got a months use out of it. The springs are so squeaky it sounds like an oak tree falling when someone sits down, it's uncomfortable, not sturdy at all, and clearly doesn't last long. We sat on this couch maybe 5 or 6 times I weigh 127 pounds and my husband weighs 160 pounds and the springs broke. Spend the extra money and get something nicer. I wish I did because we no longer have a couch.
customer_reviews.author: savannah schultz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect couch and guest bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sofa so I could get rid of the mattress in my living room and still have a place to sleep. I wouldn't recommend it as a full time bed because the comfort level isn't quite there, but as a sofa and guest sleeper this thing would be amazing! It is so adorable that it totally changed the entire look of my home for the better. The mustard color looks great, and it only took us about 20 minutes to assemble the couch and have it ready. It very easily adjusts from couch to sleeper and back with very little effort. Definitely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: Ok, so how was my overall experience?  Well!  Pretty great.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so how was my overall experience? Well. Pretty great. The sofa arrived in less than 5 days. It was easy to assemble. The fabric looks great, and everyone loves it. I am using it in a small room to create a sitting/TV area and then be able to have someone sleep over. I saw some reviews that the cushions were firm. Well. They are, but then again its brand new! So I get to break it in! Do read the instructions before starting your imstallation. LOL - do not cut the ties until after step 5. This sofa sleeper is a good bargain for the price. I will review again after I have had it slept on.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty but hard
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. Haven't finished assembly yet when I noticed a small hole where the fabric is missing. Very disappointing. I paid 330.00 dollars. Assembly seems moderate but....if you have any arthritis or difficulty grabbing hex keys get someone to help. I've spent about a hour and a half and still not done with assembly. I had to give my hands a break. I wish it used actual screws you turn with a screwdriver. I hate hex keys especially in tight spaces. Ok its finished looks pretty good. Not really comfortable but not awful. The material almost feels like denim. Satisfied so far. We will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: N Anderson

customer_reviews.title: nicely attractive, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is cleverly designed, nicely attractive, and easy to assemble. Ity is a great value for the money Two quibbles.-- There are two types of wooden legs, "D" and E". While the instructions call for the D and E pieces to go into specific spots the pieces themselves are unmarked and it is impossible to tell from the drawings which is which. The light weight of the piece works against it. When I slide forward to stand up, I have to be VERY careful or the siofa suddenly pivots under my weight. Twice I've found myself suddenly dumped on the floor wearing the back of the sofa like a hat.
customer_reviews.author: David Edward Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quality look. Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This couch isn’t comfortable but I bought it for photography so it is absolutely perfect. The colors are a little off so after seeing the picture reviews I went with navy and not green. Super super easy assembly I assembled it myself (23yr old woman) with no help. Packaging was amazing, no damage to the furniture at all even though the box was ripped to shreds when it arrived. Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Bad cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: I received the futon today. I don’t know if it is due to poor package or what, the futon looks like pictures above.will contact the dealer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect couch at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Some Chinese Engineer did a great job of designing a way for a large couch to all fit in a small box. Assembly took me about 3 hours but a younger more agile person would undoubtedly do it in less time. Instruction sheet is clear and simple to follow but I'm old and creeky so was a bit hard to move it around while assembling. While included tools are adequate to do the assembly I found it lots easier to use a deep 1/2" ratchet socket wrench for the arm assembly and a hex bit on a screw drive to start the feet. Couch looks good and am totally pleased with result.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to assemble on my own, but man it is uncomfortable. The arms are really low and narrow, so don't provide much support for leaning/lounging, and while the seats are deep enough to curl up on, after only a couple of months of using it, I could feel the hard interior bits. I now have to pile blankets onto the couch to make it soft enough to sit on, and will unfortunately be getting rid of it soon. Also, for those of you with cats - mine have never been furniture scratchers, but there's something about the material of this one that they love to dig their claws into.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great; Terribly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, this couch looks awesome. Easy to assemble. Very cleverly packaged. But MAN is this uncomfortable as all hell. Uncomfortable to sit on. Definitely uncomfortable to sleep on when put down in "bed mode." I bought this thinking I might be able to put my own (and more comfortable) stuffing in the cushions, but they are secured down and you can't do anything about it. Again - this looks amazing. Really love the style. For the price, not bad at all. Just do not make the mistake of choosing this as your main couch or as a long-term sleeping solution. Put it in a spare room for looks like I did.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to wait and own this for awhile before writing a review. When it first arrived assembly was fairly easy. Once assembled, though, immediately noticed it was a very firm couch. Not very comfortable in my opinion. I kept it anyway because it looked nice and with a blanket spread out on the couch I made it work when watching movies, etc. Now, after only six months of owning this couch I can feel a spring or something hard creeping up into my underside when I am sitting. So now I am sitting on the other side of the couch. Wow, so IKEA next time. This is too cheap for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: jennjun

customer_reviews.title: Size, and Material are AMAZING 💯
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Looks beautiful. Only took about and hour for me to assemble by myself. NO MANUAL so you have to search it under model number. Ill be sure to upload the manual pages. Other then thay it is stiff but I have no discomfort from it. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Morgunn

customer_reviews.title: Great couch and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I've loved this futon so far! Have slept on it several times as well, and it's not exactly comfy but it'll do for a night or two. I have a cat that loves to destroy things and she did damage the underside of the couch and arms some by sliding around under it or jumping on and off the arms but with a couple throw blankets it looks just fine. Recently made a big move to another state and tried to load it up without taking it apart... Big mistake. Once I got smart and took it apart it was super easy and reassembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Burditt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and annoying customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely frustrated regarding this order process. I've received the damaged futon which I have been waiting for almost a month! We were very excited for it today, but this is what we get! I am not sure how they will handle this mess but right now, I am extremely not satisfied with either their customer service or how they handle the process! I will UPDATE here if they make this right, but for now neither their customer service nor the damaged product, I am very not satisfied! SO NOT RECOMMENDING IT!
customer_reviews.author: Zeze Ander

customer_reviews.title: A great price for style and usage!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for office/guest room however may be needing for my temporary bed since my set won’t be arriving for another 30 days. It’s easy to assemble. It was two of us but one can actually do. If working with stairs I would advise to take piece out of box not as heavy. I love how it came out. Feels sturdy and comfortable especially if you’re not into soft cushion. I believe it would work well in both small and big spaces. It has a slight smell but it’s been out over a week now and its going away. A good buy for price
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a first apartment with roommates!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it about a week ago, and just arrived! Super easy to put together (screwing the arm rests on, and the legs). Came nicely packaged, and originally I even thought they forgot the arm rests, but they are nicely and compactly packaged under the futon. Putting the thing together took less than an hour. The couch is bigger than expected, and a lot roomier and comfier than expected. For the price? Can't beat it. Love my new couch and the color! And excited to have friends sleep over!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Love this futon! It’s firm, but it’s a great couch for a room you might not sit in as often. We got this for our living room where we don’t have the TV, so it won’t be used as much but it looks great. It’s not that it’s unsittable (that’s not a word), but it isn’t as comfortable as other couches we’ve had. Love that it goes down to a bed too! It did come with a rip, which is annoying but we can hide it with a throw blanket. Assembly was easy! I’m glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews which gave this futon a back rap I am happy to say it was much better than I anticipated. Having worked in the furniture business you really do get what you pay for in most cases. This isn't the cheapest but not the most costly either. I was surprised by how well the construction of the frame was. It will take two people to assemble and lift up stairs. Cushions are enough for short term sitting. May consider adding pillows or a throw blanket for additional comfort. I would personally by this again if needed. It's cat friendly and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It only lasts for six months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this couch back in June of 2017. It looked good and was pretty comfortable. So for the first 6 months I thought I got a pretty good deal. But after 6 months, we could feel the padding starting to get thin. Every passing month it has gotten thinner and thinner. Now, most of the couch is unusable. We put pads and pillows on the bottom so we can still use it. All in all, I would say this couch is junk, and I wouldn't recommend buying it. If I could give it 0 stars I would. If you want a couch that will last more than a year, dont buy rhis one.
customer_reviews.author: Dazed and Confused

customer_reviews.title: best for a spare room/office
customer_reviews.text: I just moved into a new place with a 9’x9’ spare room which i converted into an office/guest room. I decided a futon would look great and purchased this one and i am not disappointed! Its a little lighter blue color than i expected but I don’t mind it at all, I actually think it looks better! I was able to put it together myself and only needed help from my friend to flip it once it was assembled. I’d say it’s more comfortable as a firm mattress than as a couch but as long as you’re not using it as your permanent living room couch I think it’s perfect for a big/spare bedroom or office!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Surprisingly comfortable. Easy to assembly. I would not want to sleep on this as a primary bed, but it is perfect for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly terrible, very painful, breaks down in months not years
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sofa for a year now, and I can honestly say that purchasing it was a huge mistake. Absolutely everything about this sofa is bad, but I’m lazy about review writing so I’ll just mention its worst attribute. The springs are barely covered in padding and it feels like sitting on a metal grid. The only way I can sit on it without it causing pain is by folding up thick quilts and covering the seat portion. Otherwise I can feel the exact outline of the metal. I’ve only kept it bc I haven’t been using it at all, but now that coronavirus has me at home I’m tossing the thing out as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks I guess. Assembly wasn’t too rough. Packaged cleverly. But here’s the thing : a couch is to be sat on, it’s hard to sit on this. There’s not a comfortable position. It’s just plain old awkward. I had high hopes, perhaps foolish of me for the price tag being considered. Or maybe I’m just fancy, I don’t know. I don’t think that’s the case though, all I want is something that looks nice and is comfortable as the same time; If only I had a lot of money. In the end, the couch just ain’t right. You buy this thing and you’re gonna be sayin the same, for real.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but horribly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This couch looks beautiful in photos but it is the most uncomfortable piece of furniture I’ve ever sat on. I’m surprised anyone finds it comfortable. I’m young and healthy, and my back and butt hurt after sitting on it for more than 30 minutes, even when I added a plush sheepskin out of desperation. The futon also slopes downward so you feel like you’re going to slip right off, and it doesn’t feel sturdy. I honestly didn’t know furniture this uncomfortable existed. Thankfully, we have another, more comfortable sofa so this one will receive minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: JoannaT

customer_reviews.title: amazing price / you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute couch that felt like a steal for $200. However, after only one year, it's in terrible condition with only minimal use. My partner and I (both under 150 lbs) feel the pokes of rogue springs under our butts, and the middle of the seat has sunk down ~ 3 inches lower than the rest of the bench. The fabric shows wear and tear and one of the four legs is very wobbly, along with both arm rests. There is no way this couch would stand up to regular use from average-sized adults. I regret not paying more for a higher quality piece that would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It is very rare that I write a review. Positive or Negative. This is probably the most uncomfortable piece of furniture I have ever owned. I bought this for my guest room. It is my own mistake to buy something on the cheap but I made a gamble on this. I am regretting my waste of money and this has already been replaced. Do not buy this. If you are trying to furish you place and quickly do not be attracted by the low price. Spend the extra money because now I have bought 2 couches.
customer_reviews.author: Brian83Martin83

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture looks great and its a nice looking piece but its very uncomfortable. The boards are very profound when you sit on it and even when you sleep on it. I am not happy with it. Even company I've had over has said the same thing. " I like your couch (futon), but its uncomfortable". Don't waste your money here. (Purchased on July)
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it so far! It's bigger than expected (I didn't bother reading measurements) but I'm happy about that! Perfect color and very firm. I don't imagine I'd ever sleep on it because of that, but if you're good with firm- it's great lol. The only issue I can forsee is the fabric puckering. Don't know if you can tell by the pic but it looks wrinkled. Granted I sat in that spot for a few hours BUT it's a new couch so... hopefully it doesn't end up being too big of a deal. Overall, it's a great buy for the price! I'll definitely get this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Stylish affordable futon!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style I love the design. I love Novograts! The color is slightly different than in the photo. I purchased the dark green. It is dark but not as dark as pictured. Easy to assemble with instructions. Comes I a fairly small box! It’s not a super comfortable futon. But it is a futon. It comfortable enough and is nice to have a stylish fold down futon. The legs that support the top half when folded down are tucked into the back with a zipper. Unzip, fold legs down and then click clack the futon down! Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Meeechelleee

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to put together but heavy if alone
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and happy to find such a stylish couch for such a good price. I needed a couch asap and this one does the job perfectly. It’s comfortable but firm, i haven’t tried sleeping on it yet but love that the back can go down for that reason. This will definitely not be my forever couch, but it’s cute and a great value for the price. The instructions to put it together are simple, but it is heavy if your alone like I was. Also finding the instructions was tricky for me! There are zips and compartments holding the cushions and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: urszula

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are in there
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, though I wish the instructions had been put in a more obvious place; I partially unpacked the product and then printed the instructions online because I didn't see them. Cushion is firm and comfortable to sit on, bed is easy to pull out.
customer_reviews.author: Artemisia

customer_reviews.title: Great sofa to put someone on and wait for them to leave.
customer_reviews.text: -Great look for the price. -One of the legs did not fit in the leg place and took me15 minutes to force to insert into place. Thinking of returning this item was stressful enough. -The material seems easy to clean. -Good for small spaces. -Uncomfortable for prolonged sitting. But best for your in-laws or unwanted visitors. -The arms almost have no cushions around the edges which can hurt you if you're not careful around. -You have to buy 2-3 large decorative pillows to make the sofa comfortable to lay on. Otherwise its good for a decoration.
customer_reviews.author: okay ilkiz

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, comfy and great!
customer_reviews.text: I had so much difficulties to get a sofa before getting this sofa. My previous orders either kept being delayed due to lame covid reason or got cancelled. So I decided to settle down with a cheaper futon from amazon because I want a place to lie down as soon as possible. I placed my order on Tuesday and got it Friday!!! Took me and my bf less than 1 hour to assemble. I love its color and design! It also feels comfy. This is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Less Comfortable Than Sitting on the Floor
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this couch for 6 months, and I can safely say that it is so uncomfortable, I prefer to sit on the floor when watching TV. You can feel the springs through the cushions, and the slope of the back is such that you slowly slide off the couch. Additionally, my cat found a tiny hole in the cheaply made fabric on the bottom, and swiftly tore it to shreds. Definitely regret making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah S Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Polished Look for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Just got this couch a few days ago and it's exactly what I was looking for. I am really hopeful it withstands a little wear and tear. The cushions are firm but plush, very sturdy and looks gorgeous. It was a little challenging to put together - it's more of a two person job, but I wedged some books under the body of the couch so that I could effectively attach the arms. The material is soft like real leather, however it feels a little thin - here's hoping it doesn't rip or snag easily. I am short at 5'0", so I think that makes the couch work better for me than others who have had trouble sitting comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great couch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great couch! Don’t understand the negative reviews on this couch, I mean it’s a cheap couch that looks great. It can be a bit uncomfortable at times, but I use it as my main couch in my apartment and it works fine. Overall I don’t regret buying it, it’s not even close to being as bad as the negative reviews say it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yellow little sofa
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa. I find it very comfortable, firm but appropriate. It was relatively easy to put together. One of the Allen wrenches were not the right size and the small wrench that was supposed to turn the nuts was way too big and didn't work at all but I have a large toolbox of my own with better quality tools so that was not a problem for me. After I put the couch together I sealed it with Scotch guard because linen is definitely not pet resistant which is also why the blanket is down in the picture. It took the scotch guard well. It looks wonderful in our living room and is my favorite piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular use.
customer_reviews.text: So, I’m not sure about what stands out to everyone else but these reviews are all over the place. It’s a firm couch. Like, really firm. Better than your average crappy futon. The sides (arms) of the sofa aren’t overly solid. They’re making me super nervous. If it’s just a spare room sofa/bed, then I think it’d be fine... but we needed a temp sofa before we move and buy one for our next place and I’m not sure this thing will hold up for 6 months. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: The world's most uncomfortable futon
customer_reviews.text: I have a small family and step children that visit in the weekend. I saved my quarters so my stepdaughter had a place to sleep. This darn thing is the most uncomfortable sleep situation of all time. I am so disappointed in this product. The crease in the mattress is so awful. DO NOT BUY. my whole family hates this thing. I actually don't believe in bad reviews and had to make an exception
customer_reviews.author: Joe Tomter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accent chair.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and serves the purpose. Pretty large. Comfortable if you’re sitting back in it watching tv, if you’re sitting at a desk and not leaning back in it fully, your back will hurt after a while. Not too comfortable at a desk, but great as NA accent chair to fully sit back in comfortably. It came in 2 pieces with to medium length screws to attach the seat to the base of back part. Feel like the screws should be at least an inch longer for more support. Not easy to line up and screw together with one person, but I got it done.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Design and function in good taste
customer_reviews.text: The sofa futon is the perfect mid-century design accent for my newly decorated home office! The scale is perfect for the repurposing if my spare bedroom, and the color is inspiring! It brightens my outlook daily! Meanwhile, unanticipated guests now have an overnight welcome! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: LitTramp

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Easy to Assemble, Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this futon and am so glad we bought it! Love the color. The leg style is my favorite! It was pretty easy to assemble and is just an overall decent quality for what you pay. I will caution that I don’t know that this futon would be comfortable/sturdy enough to be used as a main furniture piece in a living room. We are using it in our office/guest space so it won’t be used every single day. But I think it’s a great item!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K.

customer_reviews.title: Be very sure of color before assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Well I think I would have liked it. I ordered grey, but it’s basically white. I didn’t even order “light grey”, because that option wasn’t available, but this is hardly grey. It’s hard for me to think anything else positive about it, bc I have dogs and kids, and would have never bought a white couch. Too much of a pain to disassemble and return, so we’ll just deal with it for however long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Schotters

customer_reviews.title: But even with that I love this piece
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. But even with that I love this piece. The fabric is cheap but looks like it will hold up and the mustard yellow is a beautiful tone. The back padding was a little thin also showing the price I payed for it but for the price is a very modern piece with some throwback that fits my vintage style. It seems to be really sterdy and very comfortable especially considering it’s a futon. It’s for my guest/reading room and really makes the space seem like a complete room, not just a place to let the occasional guest stay. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and hard
customer_reviews.text: I have this sofa one star bc it was so tiny! We pulled the pieces out to assemble and notice a huge rip on the back of the sofa. We sent it back and tried to just replace it with something else and Amazon sent the same couch! Not only did they send the same couch, the amazon delivery guy left the package outside of the package room. It was fine within 2 hours of delivering. We have a package room for a reason! Very disappointed in every aspect
customer_reviews.author: AtlRi

customer_reviews.title: Great couch and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like in the picture. The couch is firm but not at all uncomfortable. Its larger than I expected but comes packaged small enough that it fit through the small, very unfortunately angled doorway to my staircase. I recieved a wrong piece in the packaging for the legs but the customer service was very prompt and I got a shipping notification for the correct piece at no charge by the next morning even though I had contacted them after their listed hours of operation that night. Supwr happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Erhardt

customer_reviews.title: Look no further..
customer_reviews.text: Was so skeptical, went back and forth for months on getting this couch. Considered spending hundreds of dollars more on something different. BEYOND PLEASED with my decision. It was so easy to put together and is actually comfortable. My friend was shocked when I told him how much I paid for it, he thought it was more like $600!! Really well made and a great deal. Even the material seems very easy to clean. Highly recommend this couch!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and lighter than in the photo, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered this as an office sofa. It was relatively easy to assemble (about 40 minutes) and came with all the tools needed aside from a box cutter to open the box it shipped in. I did use my own wrench, but it comes with a cheap tool. The color is more white than grey, not cream, but the linen is nice. It's not the coziest everyday seat, and the seats are deeper than the look in the photo. Overall, we like it and it was much more affordable than office furniture but still looks polished and right for the reception area.
customer_reviews.author: Hayli May

customer_reviews.title: Not Super Comfortable, but Cheap and Compact
customer_reviews.text: It's not the most comfortable futon, but it's super cheap and fits in a small space well. Putting it together by myself was a little difficult but I managed. It's held up well so far. I would recommend laying a fluffy blanket across the seat for added comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Quiggle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this couch for two years, waste of money. The cushion in the middle completely gone. It started well, nice and comfortable enough for the price to sit on, but not so much to sleep on. But I bought it for the living room nor as a main sleeping area. Now I really have to get a new couch, impossible to sit on it without the cushion in the middle and in other places you can feel the springs when you sit. Don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ukrainka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This futon is so adorable. Easy to assemble- husband did it in about 20 minutes. Easy to convert flat. I bought the Navy linen color and it is a beautiful muted blue color. I feel that there is a large space to sit on. As far as comfort- it is firm but totally ok to sit on to watch tv or whatever, just add a few throw pillows. The back is ok to look at in case you're not putting it next to a wall. I will update as we use it more if we have any problems but otherwise I am super satisfied with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sofa/ Futon for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little sofa and I like it a lot. Don't get me wrong it is a budget item and it definitely shows but for the price you can beat it. I am right at 6 feet tall and I can barely lay down on it without bending my knees. But it is comfortable enough that I have fallen asleep laying down on it multiple times. Overall I would say if you just need a small sofa or futon and if doesn't need to be super plush (because this is not it is quite firm) then give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy Band

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My Futon came a day earlier than expected. It was a little tricky to set up, but once set up, it feels very sturdy and stable, and when my daughter came over, she said it was firm, but comfortable to sleep on. The pink color is very light and looks great. My only complaint is that the top edge of the back arrive dirty. Now that it is put together, it is very easy to convert from a sofa futon to a bed, and I love that in the bed mode, two extra feet drop down to provide additional support.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mater

customer_reviews.title: This sofa bed it’s perfect! Yes it’s not luxury but it’s really well ...
customer_reviews.text: This sofa bed it’s perfect! Yes it’s not luxury but it’s really well made. Assembly is super simple, and the twin mattress is comfortable enough since it’s memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: fabiola

customer_reviews.title: I call this one "The Back Breaker"
customer_reviews.text: Super uncomfortable when sitting, laying or reclining. I got this ot use a multi-purpose guest bed but I could never have a guest sleep on this. The bed doesn't lay flat, there is a big crease down the middle and it's not long enough to lay on - the armrest is in the way. You need to lay in the fetal position if you are taller than 5'6". We kept it because the process of returning something so big is too annoying. On a positive note, the navy blue color is very nice, it looks kind of like denim.
customer_reviews.author: Plaid Clasher

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, slightly unsturdy
customer_reviews.text: The couch looks exactly like it does in the picture. It's cushiony, but it's shallow. You can feel the wood base closer to the edges of the sitting cushions. I do have to readjust the legs pretty often because they get loose and wiggle. The space I screwed them into the base wasn't the best. Overall, it's an attractive, cheap couch. Great for students, offices, and first-apartments. I don't recommend this to anyone who plans to do any actual sleeping on this in the long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the grey futon, the color is very different from pictures (its white or a very very light grey), it will get dirty with anything, had to purchase a sofa cover, it's a hard futon not firm. Unable to return it, I threw away the box that it came in. It is easy to assemble just read the instruction carefully, it comes with all the tools you need to assemble this futon. It is pricey for the style and size of the futon unfortunately it will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: MIS

customer_reviews.title: Love this futon
customer_reviews.text: Love this futon. It’s very comfortable and the color is gorgeous! It’s perfect for small spaces. It was a lot better than I expect it to be considering the price point. It’s used by 7 boys and it’s managed to stay in great shape! When and if this one finally gives out I will definitely buy it again! However, this is a FUTON. It is a lot lower to the ground than a stationary sofa would be so if you’re over 6ft this is not the couch for you. 👍🏻 But considering we’re all short it worlds great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily. Won’t last long. Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute. Ideal for small spaces. Extremely hard and does not last long. Breaks easily. Not worth the money or hassle. It came with stain on side but over looked. Sofa lasted 2 months before all legs broke. Barely used it.
customer_reviews.author: j roberts

customer_reviews.title: Too big to return
customer_reviews.text: This is not meant for comfort sitting. The picture does the furniture more justice than it does itself in real life. The material is harsh against skin and sadly stains easily. I'd return this if they'd come pick it up but I'm not willing to navigate getting this to UPS ..
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Even better than it looks
customer_reviews.text: After one year, the middle area has sunk to the point you can feel the springs below. It's awful - extremely uncomfortable and an eye sore. Mind you, no one heavier than 150 lbs has sat on it since I got this couch. Look, you get what you pay for. Simple as that. Original review: With a fancy design like this, I was afraid it wouldn't be comfortable. But it's pretty good. As a bed, I'd not recommend it if you plan to sleep on it every night, but for rare occasion it's great. As a couch, it's very comfortable and the armrests are softer than they look. Very easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Sosa

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I love this couch it looks great and is way more comfortable than I would have thought I tested sleeping on it and it's actually fairly comfortable as a futon as well. I love the modern look and the quality seems pretty good too. Was definitely a good buy especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Laura Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best for minimal use
customer_reviews.text: This couch is stylish and pretty for the price. The green color is a nice light forest green color. Overall, the couch looks nice but it is NOT for people who sit on their couch all the time. I have had it for 5 months and there are already broken springs in the cushions. The fabric is frayed at the seams and pilling all over. It is not easy to clean or remove pet hair from. This would be best somewhere in a home for decoration and minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I  expected but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Once you can wrap your mind around how it's packaged, basically as an accordion, it goes together very smoothly. Not sure how to explain comfort level. It is very firm. Very. But I like that. The seat is somewhat shallow, but I'm relatively short, so it's perfect for me. The colour is rather brighter than I imagined, more of a turquoise, but very pretty. Seats three. Haven't had occasion to fold down the back and sleep on it yet, but I'm thinking I'll like it.
customer_reviews.author: Just Kit

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love how this sofa looks in our basement den. And you can't beat this price, either. I'm glad I purchased it. Love that it can recline into a sleeping space. Will probably get a foam topper of some sort to make it more comfortable for a guest. Kids love this couch, sections recline separately so one person can use the back cushion while another kid lays on their stomach with the second section reclined down. We are happy with the purchase. Box came some what best up, my only complaint. But it shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Beyond uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This couch/futon is absolutely beautiful! That’s the only positive thing about it. I was beyond stoked about this couch until we sat on it. The comfort level is a ZERO! No exaggeration. I was so sad because like I said it’s so beautiful and was exactly what I was looking for. I put it together on a Friday night and the following morning I had it taken apart and back in the box waiting for the UPS driver to come pick it back up to return.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love this PINK couch!
customer_reviews.text: I was holding out for a gray sleeper sofa, when I found this adorable blush futon that I could not pass up. I'm using it for my basement office/hangout area and not as my main sofa. I was so excited when I came across this. It was shipped in a box, which is good because it would be hard for me to fit a large piece of furniture down the stairs. And for a futon, it's got a decent amount of spring to it! Far better than the cheap futon I bought for a college dorm for $100 a few years ago. Could not be happier to add this piece to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not everyone’s cup of tea but if you like this style and want an affordable couch, go for it! It’s not super plush like your traditional sofa but we have found it to be quite comfortable. I’m impressed with the quality for the price. I really like how deep the seat is and honestly, this is way better than many of the sofas we sat on at IKEA. I would definitely considering purchasing again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

product_meta.title: Novogratz Brittany Sleeper Sofa with Memory Foam Mattress, Blue Linen, Queen
product_meta.description: Style Name:Queen Sleeper Sofa| Color:Navy BlueWhen it comes to saving space without compromising on comfort, the stylish Brittany sleeper sofa from Novogratz has you covered—and then some. The sofa comes in a stunning modern design, with straight lines, wooden legs, and contemporary linen upholstery that’s accented with piping details and a ribbed tufted backrest. It’s the perfect sofa for stretching out, curling up or just hanging around, with encased coil cushions that always keep you comfortable. Best of all, the Brittany sleeper sofa opens up to reveal a comfy sleeping space. Just pull out the memory foam mattress, which is specially designed to contour your body and distribute weight evenly—helping you get a good night’s sleep. The Brittany is great for small apartments or condos, the guest room or even your teen’s bedroom. A warm duvet, some comfy sheets, your favorite pillow, or just a throw… There are lots of great ways to lie back and enjoy this luxurious sleeper sofa.
feature_bullets: Modern design with wide track arms, piping details and ribbed tufted backrest
Independently encased coil sofa seat cushion delivers superior comfort
Memory foam mattress contours to your body and distributes body weight evenly
Ships in one box and assembles easily. Available in blue, dark grey, mustard and green linen.Made without phthalates
Queen sofa dimensions: 74.5"L x 32.5"W x 35.5"H. Bed dimensions: 87"L x 74.5"W x 35.5"H. Mattress dimensions: 72"L x 57"W x 3"H. Queen sofa weight limit: 600 lb. Queen bed weight limit: 500 lb.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars2,690 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
